agent_guidance.feedback: Failed to account for ORCID's structured data requirements by allowing general web search tools as the primary data source. Needed to specify API-based access requirements.
agent_guidance.revised_instruction: Include explicit instructions to use ORCID API endpoints or structured data parsing methods when accessing researcher profiles, and mandate validation checks for retrieved data.

agent_guidance.feedback: Used general web search tools to access ORCID data without implementing structured data extraction or API calls, leading to complete data retrieval failure.
agent_guidance.revised_instruction: Access ORCID profiles through their official API or structured data endpoints, extract works section data programmatically, filter by publication year <2020, and implement error handling for missing/protected data.

failure_reason: The WebSearcher failed to extract valid pre-2020 work data from ORCID pages due to reliance on general web search tools instead of ORCID-specific data retrieval methods, resulting in all-zero counts that skewed the final average.

suggestions: Add an ORCID API integration step for reliable data extraction
Implement data validation checks after web searches
Specify structured parsing requirements for ORCID page sections
Include retry mechanisms for failed ORCID page accesses
weaknesses: Lack of ORCID API integration for structured data retrieval
No validation mechanism to verify the accuracy of web-scraped ORCID data
Overly broad web search instructions that didn't account for ORCID's specific data structure
Insufficient error handling for failed ORCID page accesses
